items.description: Leading creative direction for global brands, overseeing a team of 12 designers and art directors. Spearheaded rebrands that increased client revenue by an average of 40%.
Directed visual strategies for luxury and lifestyle brands. Led award-winning campaigns that garnered international recognition including D&AD and One Show.
Developed brand identities and marketing campaigns for startups and established companies. Focused on clean, impactful design solutions.
